statements: UPDATE data_pipeline SET loaded_flag = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_pipeline SET transformed_data = 'Updated Data', loaded_flag = true WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE data_pipeline SET loaded_flag = true WHERE id = 100 AND source_id = 10;
UPDATE data_pipeline SET transformed_data = 'New Transformations', loaded_flag = true WHERE source_name = 'Source A' AND data_type = 'Type X' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE pipelines SET etl_process = 'ETL-01' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE data_sources SET source_name = 'Sales Data' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE pipelines SET destination='data_warehouse', etl_process='data_migration', source='s3_bucket' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_sources SET source_type='api', source_connection='https://example.com/api/data' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE data_sources SET source_name = 'New Source Name', connection_details = '{"host": "examplehost.com", "port": 5432}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_load SET load_query = 'SELECT * FROM new_table' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE data_sources SET source_name = 'new_source_name' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE data_load SET load_query = 'SELECT * FROM new_data_table' WHERE load_name = 'load_1'
UPDATE ETL_Stage SET data = '{}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Data_Extract SET data = '{"key": "value"}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ETL_Stage SET source = 'New Source', data = '{"key": "value"}', created_at = '2022-08-15' WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE Data_Extract SET extract_date = '2022-08-20', data = '{"key1": "value1", "key2": "value2"}' WHERE source = 'ETL_Source';
UPDATE source_data_table SET data_value = 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE pipeline_metadata_table SET pipeline_name = 'New Pipeline' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE source_data_table SET data_value = 25.75, source_name = 'New Source' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE pipeline_metadata_table SET source_table_name = 'new_source_table', transform_table_name = 'new_transform_table' WHERE pipeline_name = 'pipeline_A';
